attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To give the British people the free services offered to Scotish people free medicine,univercity fees, old aged care. It is grossly unfair to discriminate against the British people this way. When we subsidise the Scottish Parliament anyway. They should run their own parliament and be self funding and pay back all the money recieved from tha British people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
